channel.title: NEEED help with java!
channel.description: hi, i have just reinstalled windows on my computer (Now i'm using w7-64bit) so i have installed jdk 1.6.0.20 but when i try to run a client cmd says java is not an external commando press any button to whatever need help ( i used -64bit on my old comp to and i remember doing something with EnvironmentVariables or something). plzz help! working
